profileText: a Representative from South Carolina; born in Greenville, Greenville County, S.C., April 30, 1984; graduated from Christ Church Episcopal School, Greenville, S.C., 2002; B.A., The George Washington University, Washington, D.C., 2006; M.A., University of South Carolina, Columbia, S.C., 2009; J.D., University of South Carolina, Columbia, S.C., 2010; M.S., New York University, New York, N.Y., 2021; South Carolina Air National Guard, 2018-present; lawyer; businessman; staff, United States Senator William H. Frist of Tennessee, 2006-2007; member of South Carolina state senate, 2016-2019; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2019-present).
